name: Season of Sharing Fund San Francisco
description: The Chronicle Season of Sharing Fund aims to prevent homelessness by providing housing and critical needs assistance and food assistance through a network of 150 community service agencies in the nine Bay Area counties. In coordination with the Mayor’s Office of Housing and Community Development (MOHCD), Season of Sharing Fund provides one-time assistance to San Francisco County households striving to stay in their homes and keep food on the table while they get back on their feet again. Once MO
